io.simplesource.saga.model.serdes

Interface ActionSerdes<A>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - a representation of an action command that is shared across all actions in the saga. This is typically a generic type, such as Json, or if using Avro serialization, SpecificRecord or GenericRecord

    public interface ActionSerdes<A>
    The serdes required to serialize and deserialize the action request and response topics.

    • Method Summary
